SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.network.client

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.network.client.ClientConnection
public class ClientConnection extends Object
To the client the connection is now a Singleton. One can access the connection from everywhere in Client and be sure that the connection is always the same The INSTANCE is initialized only on startup of Client and can be called only once per Application

      Parameters:

      type - The type of Network protocol
      Throws:
      IOException - The connection has already been instantiated
